info.name: Sailor Moon - Hikari no Senshi
info.description:
New dash menu for the Tumblr-piece!
Inspired from the Sailor Moon S Fighting Game as well as Another Story, this simple dash brings happy time moon love to your Tumblr.

Some of my other styles:
Pink Sugar Dash Attack - http://userstyles.org/styles/74459/sailor-moon-pink-sugar-dash-attack
Lavender & Lace - http://userstyles.org/styles/74662/sailor-moon-lavender-lace
NEW! Starlight Pirouette - http://userstyles.org/styles/75386/sailor-moon-starlight-pirouette

Note - Watermark will NOT appear across your dash!
